{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-HP-G450H |revision= |upc=747464123073 |ean= |asin=B005CSOE1G |price= |est_release_date=07/15/2011 |fcc_date=05/27/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101912-0 |ic_id=6102A-036 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num=2 |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9381 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.buffalo-technology.com/products/wireless/wireless-n-nfiniti/wzr-hp-g450h-airstation-nfiniti-highpower-giga-wireless-n-router-access-point/ Product page (US)]
Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=140474 this] DD-WRT forums post, the shields are soldered on preventing removal for chip identification. The wireless chip appears to be an AR9381 or AR9384.. as the AR9384 does not seem to exist, it can be assumed the device uses AR9381. [http://www.wifi.com.cn/forum/viewthread.php?action=printable&tid=52412 This post on wifi.com.cn] says the device uses AR7242, AR8316, AR9381, and has 32MB + 64MB of Flash and RAM.. respectively. The AR8316 is visible in the FCC photos.
[http://tpholic.com/xe/7998173 DD-WRT router info screenshot] confirming AR7242, the default FW is DD-WRT
The FCC photos show the device with an MAC sticker with an OUI of 4C:E6:76.
"2976374002" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WZR-HP-G450H}}
